scripts.build: npm run build:sass && wp-scripts build && npx babel assets/js/OrganizationSubmissionForm.jsx -o assets/js/ap-org-submission.js && npx babel assets/js/SidebarMenu.jsx -o assets/js/sidebar-menu.js && npx babel assets/js/dashboard.jsx -o assets/js/ap-dashboard.js && npx babel assets/js/sidebar-taxonomies.jsx -o assets/js/sidebar-taxonomies.js && npx babel assets/js/advanced-taxonomy-filter-block.jsx -o assets/js/advanced-taxonomy-filter-block.js && npx babel assets/js/filtered-list-shortcode-block.jsx -o assets/js/filtered-list-shortcode-block.js && npx babel assets/js/ajax-filter-block.jsx -o assets/js/ajax-filter-block.js
